name: Kick Up Dust
description:
Can only be equipped by Cavalry units and can only be used while mounted. Choose one mode for this unit:
- Move to an adjacent space.
- Swap places with an adjacent ally.
Then, create a @{tile::Wind Torrent} or a @{tile::Smoke Screen} for one turn in this unitâ€™s previous space (unit chooses); this unit cannot end its movement in that tile.
